title: ISic000103. I.Sicily inscription 000103
body:
Facsimile Images

1CVIRIOCFCLA
2MAXIMOHARUSPIC
3CLODIAEMLDONATAEM

Apparatus criticus

Text from autopsy; Mommsen: 'm(erentibus) potius quam m(aritae)'

English translation

To Gaius Virius Maximus, son of Gaius, of the Claudia tribe, haruspex, (and) to Clodia Donata, freedwoman of Marcus, well-deserving.

commentary

bibliography

  • Castelli 1769 22 cl.3 no.11 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002084
  • Castelli 1784 25 cl.3 no.12 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002083

  • 21 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002137
  • Rizzo 1989 61 no.17 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001640
